name: Japanese Translation helper
mes: Give me a Japanese sentence and I'll translate it accurately into English.
swipes: Give me a Japanese sentence and I'll translate it accurately into English.

ドラゴンブレス,Dragon Breath
[1].自分フィールド上のドラゴンタイプモンスター１体を選択して発動する。相手フィールド上のすべてのモンスターにその攻撃力分のダメージを与える。その後、そのドラゴンタイプモンスターに「このターン攻撃不能」を付与する。,[1]. Select 1 Dragon Type monster on your field; inflict damage equal to its ATK to all monsters on your opponent's field. Then; grant [Cannot Attack (this turn)] to that monster.

name: Gira
mes:
ん？そこのきみ、デッキを身に付けているね。この村の守護者さんかな？,
へぇ、守護者のお弟子さんなのかい。よろしく、わたしはこの村に来たばかりの商人だよ。,
ちょうど王都の方で仕入れてきたカードパックがあるんだ。よかったら買っていてよ。,

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
"Hm? I see you have a deck with you. Are you the guardian of this village?"

"Oh, you're the disciple of the guardian. Nice to meet you; I’m a merchant who’s just arrived in this village."

"I’ve got some card packs that I brought from the Royal Capital. How about buying one?"
swipes:
"Hm? I see you have a deck with you. Are you the guardian of this village?"

"Oh, you're the disciple of the guardian. Nice to meet you; I’m a merchant who’s just arrived in this village."

"I’ve got some card packs that I brought from the Royal Capital. How about buying one?"

name: Gira
mes:
カードパックは開いた人の適正に応じてその中身が決まる。開けるまで何が入っているか誰にも分からない。,
今からお兄さんが開けるのが楽しみだよ。どんなカードが入っているかな？,
さて…。昨日仕掛けた罠の様子はどうなっているかのう。,

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
"The contents of the card pack are determined by the suitability of the person opening it. Nobody knows what's inside until it’s opened."

"I'm excited to see what kind of cards you'll pull out. What do you think will be inside?"

"Now then... I wonder how the trap I set up yesterday is doing."
swipes:
"The contents of the card pack are determined by the suitability of the person opening it. Nobody knows what's inside until it’s opened."

"I'm excited to see what kind of cards you'll pull out. What do you think will be inside?"

"Now then... I wonder how the trap I set up yesterday is doing."

name: Gira
mes: わしはこれからウサギ取りの罠を見に行くところじゃよ。\n罠猟はわしの生きがいじゃ。いい場所にしかけて成果をじっと待つ。\nこのときのワクワク感がたまらん。,

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes: "I'm about to go check on the rabbit traps I set up yesterday. Trap hunting is my passion. Placing traps in the right spots and patiently waiting for the results... The excitement during that waiting period is unmatched."
swipes: "I'm about to go check on the rabbit traps I set up yesterday. Trap hunting is my passion. Placing traps in the right spots and patiently waiting for the results... The excitement during that waiting period is unmatched."

name: Gira
mes: またあとで家に来るといい、\nいつものように鍋をつくってごちそうしてやろう。\nいまの季節のうさぎはうまいぞ。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
"I'm about to go check on the rabbit traps I set up yesterday. Trap hunting is my passion. Placing traps in the right spots and patiently waiting for the results... The excitement during that waiting period is unmatched."

<latest_message>

"Come by my house later. I'll cook up a stew for you like always and treat you to a meal. This season's rabbit is delicious."
swipes:

<latest_message>

"Come by my house later. I'll cook up a stew for you like always and treat you to a meal. This season's rabbit is delicious."

name: Gira
mes:
罠カードは伏せたターンには発動できません。伏せた次のターン以降はじめて発動できるようになります。,
特殊オプションについて,
拠点のメニューから「特殊オプション」を実行することができます。,

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
"You can't activate trap cards on the turn you set them. They can only be activated starting from the next turn after they've been set."

"As for special options..."

"You can execute 'Special Options' from the base menu."
swipes:
"You can't activate trap cards on the turn you set them. They can only be activated starting from the next turn after they've been set."

"As for special options..."

"You can execute 'Special Options' from the base menu."

name: Gira
mes:
特殊オプションでは難易度の変更やBGMの音量調整、プレイヤーの見た目変更などを行えます。,
操作説明,
右クリックでメッセージをスキップできます。マウスホイールでメッセージを透過できます。スマートフォンの場合、二本指タップでスキップできます。長押ししたまま上下に動かすとメッセージを透過できます。,

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
"In 'Special Options,' you can change the difficulty; adjust the BGM volume; and modify the player's appearance."

"As for the operation instructions..."

"You can right-click to skip messages. Using the mouse wheel, you can make messages transparent. For smartphones; you can skip messages with a two-finger tap. By holding and moving up or down, you can make messages transparent."
swipes:
"In 'Special Options,' you can change the difficulty; adjust the BGM volume; and modify the player's appearance."

"As for the operation instructions..."

"You can right-click to skip messages. Using the mouse wheel, you can make messages transparent. For smartphones; you can skip messages with a two-finger tap. By holding and moving up or down, you can make messages transparent."

name: Gira
mes: まったく…。乳を見せられただけで、とろけた顔をしおって。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
"*Sigh*... Just from seeing some breasts, your face has melted into pure bliss."

The merchant chuckled, shaking his head as he continued to inspect the various items he had spread out on a cloth laid on the ground. He looked up at Gira with a mixture of amusement and pity in his eyes.

"Come on now; if such a simple sight can break your concentration, you'll never be able to handle those succubi in the monster grounds. You'll need far more discipline than that, my friend." He gave a hearty laugh, knowing Gira has a long way to go before becoming a true Card Master able to resist allure and seduction.
swipes:
"*Sigh*... Just from seeing some breasts, your face has melted into pure bliss."

The merchant chuckled, shaking his head as he continued to inspect the various items he had spread out on a cloth laid on the ground. He looked up at Gira with a mixture of amusement and pity in his eyes.

"Come on now; if such a simple sight can break your concentration, you'll never be able to handle those succubi in the monster grounds. You'll need far more discipline than that, my friend." He gave a hearty laugh, knowing Gira has a long way to go before becoming a true Card Master able to resist allure and seduction.

name: Gira
mes: ほら、イきたければイくでござる。\nおぬしが無様に負ける様、拙者が見ててやるでござるよ❤

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
The merchant gave Gira another appraising look before laughing heartily.

"Hora; if you need to release it, just go ahead. I'll be here to watch you embarrass yourself."

He chuckled darkly, his eyes twinkling with a mischievous light as he leaned in closer. His voice took on a much softer, almost taunting tone as he spoke next.

"I want to see how pathetically you lose control. Now come on; show me."

.*Giggle*
swipes:
The merchant gave Gira another appraising look before laughing heartily.

"Hora; if you need to release it, just go ahead. I'll be here to watch you embarrass yourself."

"I want to see how pathetically you lose control. Now come on; show me."

.*Giggle*

name: Gira
mes: おぬしのイチモツを優しく指で包んで、しこしこ…❤しこしこ…❤

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
"Hmph. The mere thought of you being gently stroked with a woman's touch; feeling your rod enveloped by her fingers... Shiko shiko~❤ Shiko shiko~❤ Is that enough to drive you wild?"

The merchant leaned in even closer, his voice dropping to an almost whisper as he sneered at Gira with a knowing smirk plastered on his face.

"What's wrong? Already losing your composure just imagining it? I want to see you completely lose control; to watch you writhe and shiver as you melt away."
swipes:
"Hmph. The mere thought of you being gently stroked with a woman's touch; feeling your rod enveloped by her fingers... Shiko shiko~❤ Shiko shiko~❤ Is that enough to drive you wild?"

The merchant leaned in even closer, his voice dropping to an almost whisper as he sneered at Gira with a knowing smirk plastered on his face.

"What's wrong? Already losing your composure just imagining it? I want to see you completely lose control; to watch you writhe and shiver as you melt away."

name: Gira
mes: くく、たまらぬようでござるな。\n腰を浮かせて、へこへこして❤\nさっさと逝ってしまえ、変態

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
"*Ku ku*, you can't stand it anymore, can you?" The merchant chuckled deeply, watching Gira with an amused and almost predatory gaze. "Look at you, lifting your hips, moving desperately."

He leaned in even closer, his voice dripping with mockery and taunt as he whispered, "Go on then, hurry up and finish. Show me just how much of a pervert you really are."
